applyTo:
  - 'src/**/*.tsx'
  - 'src/**/*.ts'
excludeAgent:
  - coding
---

# Internationalization (i18n) Review Rules

**CRITICAL PRIORITY** - Every PR must pass i18n checks.

## Zero Hardcoded Text Rule

- **Every user-facing string** must use i18n
- **No exceptions**: Buttons, labels, messages, tooltips, placeholders, errors
- **Translation keys**: Added to ALL locale files (`en` and `de`)

```typescript
// ✅ Good
const { t } = useTranslation(['games', 'common']);
<Button>{t('games.actions.create')}</Button>
<Text>{t('common.labels.name')}</Text>

// ❌ Bad - AUTO-FAIL
<Button>Create Game</Button>
<Text>Name</Text>
const message = "Error occurred";
```

## Translation Structure

- **Namespace organization**: `useTranslation(['feature', 'common'])`
- **Key nesting**: `"feature": { "action": "text" }`
- **Locale files**: `src/i18n/locales/{en,de}/*.json`
- **Add to both**: English and German files simultaneously

```json
// games.json
{
  "games": {
    "actions": {
      "create": "Create Game",
      "delete": "Delete Game"
    },
    "labels": {
      "status": "Status",
      "teams": "Teams"
    }
  }
}
```

## Dynamic Content

- **Interpolation**: `t('key', { variable: value })`
- **Plurals**: Use i18next plural format
- **Dates/Numbers**: Use i18next formatting

```typescript
// ✅ Good
t('games.teamCount', { count: teams.length })
// ❌ Bad
`${teams.length} teams`;
```

## Critical Rules

- ❌ **AUTO-FAIL**: Any hardcoded UI text found
- ❌ No inline strings: "Add", "Edit", "Delete", etc.
- ❌ No template literals with UI text
- ❌ Missing translations in locale files
- ✅ All text through `t('namespace.key')`
- ✅ Both `en` and `de` locale files updated
